name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre

reviews.text: This was my second time to this hotel and no change, thats not in a bad way, staff great check in easy and the food fantastic again best to book bead and breackfast (good deal) i would go as far to say one of the best breackfast i have had. the pool well you can't fault it fantastic. best deal book direct with holiday inn at least 4 weeks in advance if you can, I have booked again and will be going back this year 2007 before heading off to Dubai. Hope this helps ( ver Close to Orchard road)
reviews.title: 2nd visit still great
Fine hotel
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed a couple of nights here,and loved it! We arrived at breakfast time after a long journey from Nepal, via Delhi, and feeling very bedraggled.. We tentatively asked whether our room was available. We were promptly taken upstairs to the executive floor,where we were not only given a room, but upgraded to a suite! Ths was a superb room, with an immensely comfortable bed. Free drinks, separate breakfast, and free use of business facilities, all in the executive lounge. Staff very friendly, and food good. Very good locatiion, close to Orchard Street - shopping, and pick up for SIA tour bus (wel worth using)
Having just stayed at the Holiday Inn Phuket, the Parkview Holiday Inn has some recognisable and familiar sights - especially where the toiletries are concerned.
reviews.title: Great Place
OK hotel near Orchard Rd
reviews.text: The Hotel is great for walking along Orchard Road. A tip - walk out towards Tanglin in the morning before it gets too warm (shops open at 10 am), and then start shopping (or rather walking) back towards the hotel, which is behind Robinsons Centrepoint.

aka: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre Hotel Singapore
description: Welcome to Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre, formerly Holiday Inn Park View Singapore, in the heart of downtown Singapore! Whether for business or leisure, our central location is 10minutes away from the central business district and a convenient 2minute walk away from the shoppers’ paradise, Orchard Road. Public transport is just 3minutes away, providing easy access to the city's cultural heritage and tourist attractions like Chinatown, Little India, Sentosa and the Night Safari.
